meanings.definition: The act of moving or changing position.
meanings.sent1: The shiftings of the dancers on stage were graceful and fluid.
meanings.sent2: I noticed the shiftings of the clouds as they drifted across the sky.
meanings.sent3: The shiftings of the furniture in the haunted house made it seem like it had a life of its own.
meanings.sent4: Her mood underwent shiftings like the tides of the ocean, unpredictable and ever-changing.
meanings.sent5: The shiftings of the sand dunes created mesmerizing patterns in the desert.

meanings.sent1: The shiftings in temperature made it hard to decide what to wear.
meanings.sent2: The shiftings in the stock market affected investors' decisions.
meanings.sent3: The shiftings in the recipe gave the dish a unique flavor.
meanings.sent4: The shiftings in her voice indicated she was about to cry.
meanings.sent5: The shiftings in the music genre reflected the evolving tastes of the audience.

meanings.definition: The process of shifting or being shifted.
meanings.sent1: The shiftings of gears in the car were smooth and efficient.
meanings.sent2: I observed the shiftings of focus in the camera lens.
meanings.sent3: The shiftings of power within the organization caused some tension.
meanings.sent4: The shiftings of responsibility among the team members helped improve collaboration.
meanings.sent5: The shiftings of colors in the painting added depth and dimension.
